ruling: - When you activate [[Lyla, Lightsworn Sorceress]]' effect to destroy 1 Spell or Trap Card, it is changed to Defense Position when the effect resolves. It is not a cost to activate this effect.
- This effect targets 1 Spell or Trap Card your opponent controls.

- If you activate [[Lyla, Lightsworn Sorceress]]' effect while [[Final Attack Orders]] is active, [[Lyla, Lightsworn Sorceress]] will be changed to Attack Position after resolving its effect and its effect can be activated again.
- If you activate [[Lyla, Lightsworn Sorceress]]' effect and an effect is chained that shifts [[Lyla, Lightsworn Sorceress]] into Defense Position or removes it from the field, its effect disappears.
- See [[Jain, Lightsworn Paladin]] for additional rulings.
